How to learn from tutorial videos

Sun, Nov 10, 19 in general

If you’re on a journey in software development or any other technical discipline, you’ll find that the importance of finding your own way to learn something quickly and efficiently is as obvious as the sky is blue. But it seems most online tutorials adopt a one size fits all approach. This is how I adapt my learning to suit me. And how I follow tutorials in my own way.

The identity crisis of CSS

Fri, Oct 25, 19 in opinion

This is my go-to website for currency conversion, requency of my visits have gone up since the 2016 Brexit referendum to see where the pound is languishing against the euro and dollar. Hasn’t changed that much over the years, had a facelift and an app which I’m trying out on my android phone.

About this blog

My personal collection of thoughts about web design, websites, apps and everything in between.

I'm a London based web designer currently working at Hamilton Brown.

Here you will find

  • My brain farts
  • My rants
  • My reviews on existing websites and apps
